Career Objective 
             Seeking a challenging position to utilize my skills and knowledge in an organization 
which  provides a steady career growth and give value contribution in the success of 
organization. 
 
Education            
             B.E-Electronic & Communication Engineering (2016) from Anna University, 
Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. 
 
Scope of Work 
 Co-ordination of (MEP) services while installation on site to avoid future problems. 
 Ability to read and interpret blueprints, schematics, and other technical specifications. 
 Operational knowledge of various smoke detector. 
 Hands on working experience as a Field Service Engineer. 
 Hands on working experience in installation, troubleshooting, Maintenance, testing and 
commissioning of  Fire alarm system.                                                          
 Hands on working experience in installation, troubleshooting, Maintenance of CCTV 
system, Access Control, Public Address system. 
 Proficient in using multimeter. 
 Site visiting and Troubleshoot the problems and providing the best possible solution. 
 Team player with a quick learning capability. 
 Coordinated with the customers to understand their safety and security requirements 
and provide necessary technical solutions to their needs. 
 Hands on Working Experience in Sprinkler Installation, Testing Commissioning & 
Maintenance. 
 Hands on working experience in Installation, Testing, and Commissioning of Fire Pumps 
in all aspects. 
 Ability to work in pressure testing & setting of Jockey & Fire Pumps. 
 Proficient to handle flow monitoring devices. 
 Operational knowledge of all Valves including Installation Control Valve for Sprinkler 
system. 
 Hands on working experience in Installation, Testing & Commissioning of internal Fire 
Hydrants. 
 Hands on working experience in Installation, Testing & Commissioning of internal Yard 
Hydrants & Fire Brigade Inlet arrangements. 

 
Area of Interest 
 Integrated Building Management System (IBMS) 
 Safety and Security Product 
 Automation Products                                                              
Technical skills 
 Fire  Alarm,CCTV,Access Control 
 Fire Fighting.

              Project Name    :  Hiranandhani South Residential Project

Roles and Responsibility 
 Interior Planning, designing & execution works in site.   
 Preparing the Technical Materials Submittal and Submit and get the approval from 
Consultant   and Client. 
 Finish the works as on date and co-ordinate with the consultant engineers for the site 
visit. 
 Estimate the Materials and Manpower for projects. 
 Maintained good professional relationship with Consultant and Client. 
 Evaluated and resolved all technical problems in the projects. 
 Tested all products for correct installation and operation. 
 Reporting the Daily Work items to the Project Manager and Coordinate with Contractor 
for the fast progress work on site implementation. 
 Ensure project completion within budget and on schedule. 
Software Knowledge
